Well the weather isn't the same throughout Karnataka, it's a large state after all. 

In Bengaluru though, the weather is pleasant from June to February(in the 21 to 27 degrees celcius range). The rains aren't too heavy during monsoons but they tend to be disruptive occasionally. Carry a rain jacket and an all-purpose jacket that keeps you warm for these months.

Summers only last from the end of February to Mid-Late May and this year, April was the only month I found unbearably hot.
